mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Paul, W. M. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Paul, W. M.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Dated Newburg Aug 18 1862. Rec'd 1862. o'clock min. M. to His Excellency Gov F.H. Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Can we organize with sixty six (66) men & elect the officers for said company if so I ask for our order for transportation from this place W. M. Paul 26 383pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Paul, W. M.
Newburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
